frontmatter.title: OpenShift Commons Gathering on Databases
frontmatter.description: This OpenShift Commons Gathering will be broadcast live around the globe. As always, our focus is on creating a welcoming and inclusive space for peer-to-peer interactions online.
frontmatter.lead_text: This OpenShift Commons Gathering on Databases will be held on February 23rd in Pacific Time
frontmatter.info_text: This OpenShift Commons Gathering will be broadcast live around the globe. As always, our focus is on creating a welcoming and inclusive space for peer-to-peer interactions online. This Gathering will focus on talks from and by GitOps practitioners with production deployments sharing their use cases, insights into their workloads and lessons learned along the way.
frontmatter.event_footer_text: All times specified are Pacific Time

schedule.session_name: Welcome to the Commons: Unlock the Potential of Collaboration
Keynote: Simplifying Database Cloud Service Access with RHODA
Building the Ignite AI Platform using PostgreSQL and Kafka on OpenShift
Sahibinden’s Cloud Transformation: Deploying MySQL, Cassandra, MongoDB using OpenShift Virtualization
Pathfinding Next Generation Database Services in British Columbia Provincial Government (Canada)
Backup and DR for databases on OpenShift
Databases AMA Session: Live Q/A with Guest Speakers, Red Hat Engineers & Project Leads
